room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: Had an awesome birthday experience here with my friends! Very helpful and accomodating with planning for a big group. Tons of fun and we all agree we want to come back for the second room experience. Team work and logic help you big time in this place!

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: SO much fun!!!! Did this with complete strangers and had a blast. Def will be coming to try the next room!!

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: Super fun and makes you really use your noggin! Great idea and the host Bianka was amazing! Thank you for the wonderful time!

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: I cannot believe how challenging and fun this experience was I love this so much that I just might have to come back

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: I'm going to assume that the two people who didn't rate this as a five are sore losers. Excellent atmosphere, great staff, fantastic puzzles. We're coming back.

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: What a great time we had. Great challenges and the rooms are well put together. It was very fun working as teams to solve the puzzles. We will be back for another. Highly recommend, a great night out.

room_title: Escape room "Room Amnesia" by QQuest Escape Games in Miami
review: It is the most the most magical thing in the whole wide world I love it so much. The puzzles are always interesting and it's so funny the the simple things u will over think that solve the puzzles. The people who work there are also very nice and I've already tried 3 of their rooms and just want to do all of them. I think they r better than other escape the rooms I've seen and I love how they have more than one room. Altogether an amazing escape the room!
